interpolation.title: Interpolation
interpolation.intro: Change the first name and last name values to see them interpolated into the translated strings. Try this in different languages by using the language switcher in the top bar.

plurals.title: Plurals
plurals.intro: Change the count to see the various plural forms for the selected language. Try this in different languages.
